segments.description: A close-up of a young athlete's determined face, sweat glistening as they prepare for an extreme sports challenge. The camera slowly zooms out to reveal the breathtaking landscape of a mountain range in the background. The atmosphere is charged with energy.
segments.visualPrompt: Close-up of a young athlete's face, showing focus and determination. Soft natural light highlights their features. The camera slowly zooms out to reveal a stunning mountain landscape in the background, setting the stage for an extreme sports adventure. The athlete is wearing a sporty outfit, with the energy drink can visible in their hand.
visualPromptAlternatives: Wide shot of the athlete standing at the edge of a cliff, ocean waves crashing below. The sun sets in the background, casting a golden hue. The athlete raises the energy drink can triumphantly.
A dynamic shot from behind the athlete, capturing them gearing up with the mountains ahead. The camera pans smoothly from left to right, showcasing the dramatic scenery.
Close-up of the athlete's hand gripping the energy drink can, then cutting to a wide shot as they take a deep breath, ready to tackle the challenge.
segments.audioNotes: Music: Pulsating electronic music builds excitement. Voiceover: 'Are you ready to unleash your potential?'

segments.description: The athlete launches off a mountain bike ramp, soaring through the air with a smile. The camera follows the action in a steady, fast-paced tracking shot, showcasing the thrill of the jump and the beauty of the surrounding nature.
segments.visualPrompt: Dynamic tracking shot of the athlete launching off a bike ramp, captured in slow motion to emphasize the thrill. The camera focuses on the athlete mid-air, with the energy drink can clearly visible attached to their gear. The vibrant blue sky and lush green mountains create a thrilling backdrop.
visualPromptAlternatives: A close-up of the wheels as they hit the ramp, then quickly cutting to a wide shot of the athlete flying through the air, with dramatic music intensifying the moment.
Side angle shot of the athlete executing a trick in the air, with an aerial view of the landscape below. The energy drink logo is prominently displayed on their gear.
A POV shot from the athlete's perspective as they ride down the trail, weaving through trees, with the energy drink can in view on the side.
segments.audioNotes: Music: Upbeat, high-energy music. Voiceover: 'Boost your performance and fuel your adrenaline!'

segments.description: The athlete lands perfectly, pumping their fist in the air in victory. The camera zooms in on the energy drink can as they take a refreshing sip, showcasing the product front and center. The backdrop features the majestic mountains.
segments.visualPrompt: Close-up shot of the athlete landing smoothly and celebrating their success. The camera then focuses on the energy drink can as the athlete takes a sip, with the mountain scenery beautifully framing the shot. The energy drink logo is clearly visible.
visualPromptAlternatives: Wide shot of the athlete celebrating with friends, all holding the energy drink cans, creating a sense of camaraderie and excitement.
A close-up of the athleteâ€™s satisfied expression after the sip, then pulling back to show them surrounded by nature, with the energy drink can in hand.
Dynamic angle of the athlete high-fiving friends after landing, with the energy drink can prominently displayed in the foreground.
segments.audioNotes: Music: Climactic finish to the track. Voiceover: 'Try it now and feel the rush!'
